header.title: My Tech Stack
header.subtitle: The platforms, tools, and methodologies I use to build effective and scalable enterprise solutions.

items.name: Microsoft Power Automate
items.description: My primary tool for designing and orchestrating complex, end-to-end business process automations (BPA), building robust API integrations, and delivering scalable workflow solutions.

items.name: Microsoft Copilot Studio
items.description: Used to build enterprise-grade conversational AI assistants and custom copilots that leverage Generative AI plugins to perform complex actions and streamline user interactions.

items.name: Microsoft Power Apps
items.description: For creating custom, low-code applications that serve as intuitive, user-friendly interfaces for sophisticated automated workflows and data management.

items.name: Microsoft Azure AI
items.description: Leveraging services like Azure OpenAI and Azure AI Language to add advanced intelligence, such as natural language understanding and summarization, to enterprise solutions.

items.name: Google Gemini API
items.description: Integrating cutting-edge multimodal and Generative AI capabilities for tasks like content generation, structured data extraction from images, and complex reasoning.

items.name: Dataverse
items.description: For creating scalable and secure data models that provide a robust foundation for enterprise-grade Power Platform solutions, ensuring data integrity and governance.

items.name: React & TypeScript
items.description: The foundation for building modern, performant, and type-safe user interfaces and single-page applications, ensuring a high-quality user experience.

items.name: HTML5 & CSS3
items.description: Core web technologies used to structure content semantically and create responsive, accessible, and visually appealing designs that work across all devices.

items.name: TailwindCSS
items.description: A utility-first CSS framework that enables rapid UI development, consistent styling, and maintainable design systems without leaving the HTML.

items.name: Git & GitHub
items.description: Essential for robust version control, effective team collaboration, and managing codebases through branching, merging, and pull requests.

items.name: VS Code
items.description: My primary code editor, highly customized with extensions and settings for maximum efficiency in web, Power Platform, and AI development.

items.name: Postman
items.description: An indispensable tool for testing, documenting, and interacting with RESTful APIs, crucial for the integration phase of any automation project.

items.name: Agile & Scrum
items.description: Applying the Agile mindset and Scrum framework to deliver projects iteratively, ensuring continuous feedback, stakeholder collaboration, and rapid value delivery.

items.name: Product Ownership
items.description: Taking full ownership of the product vision, managing and prioritizing the backlog, and making data-driven decisions to maximize business value and ROI.

items.name: Design Thinking
items.description: Utilizing a human-centric approach to problem-solving that focuses on empathy, ideation, and rapid prototyping to create solutions that users love.

items.name: Process Mining & Analysis
items.description: Leveraging data to analyze and visualize business processes, allowing for the identification of bottlenecks, inefficiencies, and high-impact automation opportunities.
